Articles.Content:
With every new career mode game I start, I keep meaning to post a thread in Mission Reports. With the release of 1.0.5, I finally decided to just buckle down and do it. Since the release of 1.1 is imminent, I shall be keeping the mod count down to only the most popular and quickly updated mods.

This thread is gonna be pretty light on storytelling right now, as I'm having to focus more on gameplay due to how terrible at early career I am. Later on, I'll be able to focus more on building characters and the world, possibly by editing earlier posts a bit.

Mod list:

- Kerbal Alarm Clock

- Kerbal Engineer Redux

- MechJeb

- Vanguard EVA Parachutes

- USI Sounding Rockets!

- Actually, I think that's it. O_o

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Flight of the Tiny Joe, to prove launching a rocket is... possible?

Only surviving photo of the Little Joe suborbital rocket 'Rokker 7', flown to prove that Kerbals don't go insane in space

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Comprehensive photo documentation of the Medium Joe I-class rocket 'Supernovy 7', the first Kerbal orbital rocket.

Next: To the Mun! Well, we're gonna fly past it, at least. Not sure about landing on it. Might launch a probe to do that first.

Edited November 10, 2015 by Kagame
Oops.
